description.1: My name is Harlon. I started my career as a graphic designer, where I worked for 2 years. However, my passion for programming led me to make a career transition, and since 2021 I have been studying and working with
description.2: I'm excited to apply my combination of design and programming skills, which allows me to create creative and functional solutions.
